operations.name: file.list
operations.description: Lists files in the specified path, with options for recursion, filtering, and limiting results.

operations.name: file.read
operations.description: Reads content from a file starting at a specified offset and length.

operations.name: file.compute_hash
operations.description: Computes a hash (e.g., SHA256) for the specified file.

operations.name: file.find_duplicates
operations.description: Finds duplicate files in a path based on hash or perceptual similarity.

operations.name: file.move
operations.description: Moves files from source to destination, with dry-run option.
operations.preview: required (list of planned moves + counts + size)

operations.name: file.copy
operations.description: Copies files from source to destination, with dry-run option.

operations.name: file.delete
operations.description: Deletes files at the specified path, with dry-run and force options.
operations.undo: soft-delete/trash (move to trash bucket, reversible for retention window)

operations.name: file.create_folder
operations.description: Creates a new folder at the specified path.

operations.name: file.list_large_files
operations.description: Lists files larger than the specified size threshold in a path.

operations.name: file.update_metadata
operations.description: Updates metadata for a file.

operations.name: organize.by_rules
operations.description: Organizes files in a path based on predefined rules.

operations.name: organize.apply_template
operations.description: Applies an organization template to files in a path.

operations.name: file.find_by_content
operations.description: Searches files by content in a path.

operations.name: snapshot.create
operations.description: Creates a snapshot of specified paths for backup.

operations.name: snapshot.list
operations.description: Lists available snapshots.

operations.name: snapshot.restore
operations.description: Restores a snapshot to a target path.
operations.undo: create new snapshot of current state before restore

operations.name: snapshot.delete
operations.description: Deletes a specified snapshot.

operations.name: ocr.extract_text
operations.description: Extracts text from images or PDFs using OCR.
operations.undo: N/A (creates derived artifact in object store)

operations.name: parser.extract_metadata
operations.description: Extracts structured metadata (e.g., from invoices or receipts).

operations.name: rag.index_file
operations.description: Indexes a file for RAG semantic search.
operations.preview: num chunks, token estimate, cost estimate

operations.name: rag.reindex_folder
operations.description: Reindexes all files in a folder for RAG.

operations.name: search.semantic
operations.description: Performs semantic search using embeddings.

operations.name: search.hybrid
operations.description: Performs hybrid search (semantic + full-text).

operations.name: custom_search
operations.description: Performs a web search using Google Custom Search API.

operations.name: task.create
operations.description: Creates a new task.

operations.name: task.update
operations.description: Updates an existing task.

operations.name: task.list
operations.description: Lists tasks for a user.

operations.name: task.mark_complete
operations.description: Marks a task as complete.

operations.name: task.auto_reschedule
operations.description: Automatically reschedules a task.

operations.name: calendar.create_event
operations.description: Creates a calendar event.

operations.name: task.deadline_checkin
operations.description: Checks in on a task deadline and prompts for status.

operations.name: email.fetch_recent
operations.description: Fetches recent emails for a user.

operations.name: email.triage
operations.description: Triages emails and suggests actions.

operations.name: email.draft_reply
operations.description: Drafts a reply to an email.

operations.name: focus.start_session
operations.description: Starts a focus session with app/url blocking.
operations.capabilities: system_control (app kill, hosts file / firewall rules), notification
operations.preview: blocked items list & expected end time

operations.name: focus.end_session
operations.description: Ends a focus session.

operations.name: focus.log_distraction
operations.description: Logs a distraction during a focus session.

operations.name: expenses.process_folder
operations.description: Processes receipts in a folder to create expense entries.
operations.preview: list of receipts, totals, suggested categories

operations.name: expenses.create_report
operations.description: Creates an expense report.

operations.name: expenses.submit
operations.description: Submits an expense report.

operations.name: meeting.start_recording
operations.description: Starts recording a meeting.

operations.name: meeting.transcribe
operations.description: Transcribes a meeting recording.

operations.name: meeting.extract_actions
operations.description: Extracts action items from a meeting transcript.

operations.name: rules.create
operations.description: Creates a new automation rule.

operations.name: rules.simulate
operations.description: Simulates running a rule on a sample event.

operations.name: rules.run
operations.description: Runs a specified rule on an event.
operations.capabilities: db_read, operations capabilities used by actions
operations.safety: confirm if rule performs destructive ops (first-run)

operations.name: system.run_command_sandboxed
operations.description: Runs a command in a sandboxed environment.

operations.name: file.preview_changes
operations.description: Previews changes from a series of file operations.

operations.name: audit.log_query
operations.description: Queries audit logs for operations.

operations.name: undo.last_operation
operations.description: Undoes the last operation if possible.
operations.capabilities: depends on op being reversed (fs_write etc.)

operations.name: kb.create_entry
operations.description: Creates a new knowledge base entry.

operations.name: kb.search
operations.description: Searches the knowledge base.

operations.name: autofill.fill_form
operations.description: Autofills a form using profile data.

operations.name: maintenance.cleanup_temp
operations.description: Cleans up temporary files older than specified days.

operations.name: monitor.list_processes
operations.description: Lists running processes.

operations.name: monitor.kill_process
operations.description: Kills a running process.

operations.name: office.word.create
operations.description: Creates or edits a Word document with provided content (string or list of paragraphs), launches Word, inserts content, and displays the file.

operations.name: office.excel.create
operations.description: Creates or edits an Excel sheet with provided content (list of lists for data, or JSON with charts/formulas), launches Excel, inserts content, and displays the file.

operations.name: office.ppt.create
operations.description: Creates or edits a PowerPoint presentation with provided content (list of dicts {title, content, notes}), launches PowerPoint, inserts slides, and displays the file.
